pre.expressions.pre.expressions: // the above statement sets the temp.type to the category in the current file to prevent the SYSATTACHMENTS section of the device cascadeupdate record from executing when the device type has not bee changed

// The cascadeupdate record changes the temp.type field to the old type temporarily for comparison purposes. Once it is done it needs to be set to equal the category to prevent the cascadeupd from executing again
